name: Team Up

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Gang Up, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: When you and at least two of your allies are adjacent to an opponent, you can attempt the aid another action as a move action.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Aid another is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: When you are ganging up against an enemy, you can aid an ally with a quick feint.
